sn22.128:1.1: At one time Venerable Sāriputta and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita were staying near Varanasi, in the deer park at Isipatana. …
sn22.128:1.3: “Reverend Sāriputta, they speak of this thing called ‘knowledge’.
sn22.128:1.5: And how is a knowledgeable person defined?”
sn22.128:2.1: “Reverend, it’s when a learned noble disciple truly understands form, which is liable to originate … liable to vanish … liable to originate and vanish, as form which is liable to originate and vanish.
sn22.128:2.5: consciousness, which is liable to originate … liable to vanish … liable to originate and vanish, as consciousness which is liable to originate and vanish.
sn22.128:2.7: And this is how a knowledgeable person is defined.”
